document_data.name: Gruen Bleth
document_data.mainbody: '''Lord Gruen Bleth''' was a [[human]] man and a member of the [[Bleth]] noble family of [[Cormyr]] in the 14th century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Gruen Bleth was a gentle person.
document_data.History:
Around [[1367 DR]], Gruen was the leading member of the Bleth family and he controlled the [[Seven Suns Trading Coster]] in Cormyr. Although he lived at the [[Bleth Estate]] in [[Suzail]], he spent much of his time at the Seven Suns yard in the city managing the business.

In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Lord Gruen and Lady [[Amarsa Bleth]] attended a birthday feast for King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV|Azoun IV]], and were guests of Lord [[Partic Thistle]] at his manor, [[Thistleflame Keep]]. They knew nothing about Lord Thistle's apparent murder that night.
